channel.title: Never done before? [Runescape] Text-Base! [/Devo]
channel.description:
[size=14pt][font=verdana][b]Unknown Name [Comming up with one suggestions?][/b][/font][/size] [font=verdana]
[b]A little about the developer[/b] [i]I have been coding in javascript, php, css, and html for since 2006 and have been doing little projects but now I am ready for one big noticeable project. I would however like a team to help out with the big things like adding items into the database will take one person a very long time, but if I don't have a team, i'm sure i'll manage.[/i]
[b]A little background knowledge[/b] [i]Yes, this will be coded in PHP and all forms of Javascript. The reason I decided to begin this project is because having a text-based version of Runescape means that you can play it on your phone on the go, PSP, or any other portable device. The site and its features will have at least 3 updates a month, these updates can include a new item, a new quest etc. I also wanted to do this because [to my knowledge] this has never been done before. The game will include: All skills, Many quests, Items, Pking, Training, All skills (From 2009) dialogue, and much more![/i]
[b]Current Features:[/b] [i]a little side note I do have all of Runescape's items but, not all of them are on the item database yet. They will be but it will take a little but of time the current item list is listed below however.[/i] [code] [July 2, 2011] - Log in page [July 2, 2011] - Added player rank crowns [July 2, 2011] - All Runescape items [July 2, 2011] - Current users visiting [July 2, 2011] - Register an Account [July 2 2011] - Homepage [/code]
[b]Current Item List![/b] [code] 1037 Bunny Ears 1038 Red Partyhat 1040 Yellow Partyhat 1042 Blue Partyhat 1044 Green Partyhat 1046 Purple Partyhat 1048 White Partyhat 1050 Santa Hat 1053 Green H'ween Mask 1055 Blue H'ween Mask 1057 Red H'ween Mask 4151 Whip [/code]
[b]Media - None yet adding later today![/b]

item.title: Never done before? [Runescape] Text-Base! [/Devo]
item.dc:creator: @demps2k9 demps2k9
item.description:
@demps2k9 wrote:

Sounds like a very good idea.

Although I am not very good at PHP, I studied HTML and I am pretty good at it, CSS I am sort of ok with and as for Javascript, I am pretty much a beginner but I have studied Javascript for a few months now.

Good luck with this project.

Read full topic

item.title: Never done before? [Runescape] Text-Base! [/Devo]
item.dc:creator: @Good_Memory Good Memory
item.description:
@Good_Memory wrote:

[size=14pt][font=verdana]Unknown Name [Comming up with one suggestions?][/font][/size]
[font=verdana]

A little about the developer
I have been coding in javascript, php, css, and html for since 2006 and have been doing little projects but now I am ready for one big noticeable project. I would however like a team to help out with the big things like adding items into the database will take one person a very long time, but if I don’t have a team, i’m sure i’ll manage.

A little background knowledge
Yes, this will be coded in PHP and all forms of Javascript. The reason I decided to begin this project is because having a text-based version of Runescape means that you can play it on your phone on the go, PSP, or any other portable device. The site and its features will have at least 3 updates a month, these updates can include a new item, a new quest etc. I also wanted to do this because [to my knowledge] this has never been done before. The game will include: All skills, Many quests, Items, Pking, Training, All skills (From 2009) dialogue, and much more!

Current Features:
a little side note I do have all of Runescape’s items but, not all of them are on the item database yet. They will be but it will take a little but of time the current item list is listed below however.

[July 2, 2011] - Log in page
[July 2, 2011] - Added player rank crowns
[July 2, 2011] - All Runescape items
[July 2, 2011] - Current users visiting
[July 2, 2011] - Register an Account
[July 2 2011] - Homepage

Current Item List!

1037 Bunny Ears 1038 Red Partyhat 1040 Yellow Partyhat 1042 Blue Partyhat 1044 Green Partyhat 1046 Purple Partyhat 1048 White Partyhat 1050 Santa Hat 1053 Green H'ween Mask 1055 Blue H'ween Mask 1057 Red H'ween Mask 4151 Whip
